name: Dhon M. Kekim
text: On first day, divide 1000 by 10, each of them drinks a sip from 1-100. Say Person A drinks from 1-100, B sa 101 to 200 and so on. 2nd day, divide each of this 100 by 10. Person A will drink 1-10, B 11-20. Repeat this for each of the 100/10. 3rd day, divide 10 by 10, person A drinks on first, B on second, and so on. Start observing who dies in day 8, 9, 10. Max casualties, 3 persons.

source_obj.text: On first day, divide 1000 by 10, each of them drinks a sip from 1-100. Say Person A drinks from 1-100, B sa 101 to 200 and so on. 2nd day, divide each of this 100 by 10. Max casualties, 3 persons.
